Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Middle Egypt, el-Amarna (Akhetaten); inc. el-Hagg Qandil, Great Temple of the Aten, pit outside southern wall, Petrie/Carter 1891–1892
Dimensions: H. 42 x W. 13 x D. 19 cm
Provenance: Excavated at Amarna by Petrie and Carter 1891-2. Received by Lord Amherst in the division of finds. Purchased by the Museum at Sotheby's, London, 1921.
